info.name: MyAnimeList.net - Nav Restyle
info.description:
==== MyAnimeList.net - Nav Restyle ====
	Some ideas taken from other styles. ;)
	(Discontinued)
info.additionalInfo:
Colours are pre-set to match my style 7678

If the nav suddenly becomes weird just disable and enable this style.
Sometimes other styles gets applies over this, re-enabling will solve that.
